title: Notarize
description: Notarize, the first on-demand remote electronic notary service, allows anyone to legally notarize a document from their iPhone or Desktop 24 hours per day, 7 days per week. Notarize is valid nationally and connects customers with licensed Virginia electronic notaries by live video call. Simply download the app, prove your identity, fill out your document, and sign before a live agent to have it notarized instantly.
